'''Chase the Skies''' is a skin pack promoting [[Chase the Skies]]. The pack consists of two skins, one based off a character created to promote a series of [[Character Creator]] items, the other an original design.

|Ghast Riding Swimmer
|[[File:Ghast Riding Swimmer.png|width=131x131]]
|A swimmer wearing cyan with a bit of dark cyan swimsuit, with warm skin, light yellow hair, goggles, and a bright smile. Its clothes, a swimsuit with happy ghast with goggles floaters on both arms, with [[Harness|harness]] floatie the waist and sandals.
|A simplified version of [[Chase_the_Skies#Take_on_Ghastastic_Challenges|Ghast Rider Floatie]], made to fit the limitations of [[Skin|skins]].
|-
|Happy Ghast Pilot
|[[File:Happy Ghast Pilot.png|width=131x131]]
|A pilot wearing a brown flight jacket with a hook on both arms, and gloves with white fur along with a white scarf, brown helmet and goggles. Its other clothes, black pants with gold trimmings resembling a [[Happy Ghast#Happy_Ghast_with_all_harness_colors|happy ghast]] equipped with the black harness and dark brown boots.
|Another simplified version of [[Chase_the_Skies#Take_on_Ghastastic_Challenges|Happy Ghast Pilot Gear]], made to fit the limitations of [[Skin|skins]]. Underneath the mask, there are no facial features at all.
|}
